Token.Abstract: Main class used to issue REST requests to the standard Force.com REST API. See the Force.com REST API Developer's Guide for more information regarding the Force.com REST API.
The REST API version used for all the calls. The default value is kSFRestDefaultAPIVersion (currently "v55.0")
The REST API version used for all the calls. The default value is kSFRestDefaultAPIVersion (currently "v55.0")
The REST API version used for all the calls. The default value is kSFRestDefaultAPIVersion (currently "v55.0")
The user associated with this instance of SFRestAPI.
The user associated with this instance of SFRestAPI.
The user associated with this instance of SFRestAPI.
Returns the singleton instance of SFRestAPI associated with the specified user.
Specifies whether the current execution is a test run.

Parameter.Name: isTestRun
Parameter.Abstract: YES if this is a test run.

Token.Abstract: Indicates whether the current execution is a test run.

ReturnValue.Abstract: True if this execution is a test run.

Token.Abstract: Perform cleanup due to a host change or logout.
Cancel all requests that are waiting to be executed.
Sends a REST request to the Salesforce server and invokes the appropriate delegate method.

Parameter.Name: requestDelegate
Parameter.Abstract: Delegate object that handles the server response.

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that contains information associated with the current user.
Returns an SFRestRequest object that lists summary information about each Salesforce.com version currently available. Summaries include the version, label, and a link to each version's root.
Returns an SFRestRequest object that lists available resources for the client's API version, including resource name and URI.
Returns an SFRestRequest object that lists available objects in your org and their metadata.
Returns an SFRestRequest object that describes the individual metadata for the specified object.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: Type of a Salesforce object. Example: "Account".

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that completely describes the metadata at all levels for the specified object.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: Type of a Salesforce object. Example: "Account".

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that provides layout data for the specified parameters.
Token.Declaration: - (SFRestRequest *)requestForLayoutWithObjectAPIName:(nonnull NSString *)objectAPIName formFactor:(nullable NSString *)formFactor layoutType:(nullable NSString *)layoutType mode:(nullable NSString *)mode recordTypeId:(nullable NSString *)recordTypeId apiVersion:(nullable NSString *)apiVersion

Parameter.Name: formFactor
Parameter.Abstract: Form factor. Could be "Large", "Medium" or "Small". Default value is "Large".

Parameter.Name: layoutType
Parameter.Abstract: Layout type. Could be "Compact" or "Full". Default value is "Full".

Parameter.Name: mode
Parameter.Abstract: Mode. Could be "Create", "Edit" or "View". Default value is "View".

Parameter.Name: recordTypeId
Parameter.Abstract: Record type ID. Default will be used if not supplied.

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that retrieves field values for the specified record of the given type.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: Type of a Salesforce object. Example: "Account".

Parameter.Name: fieldList
Parameter.Abstract: Comma-separated list of fields for which to return values. Example: "Name,Industry,TickerSymbol". Pass nil to retrieve all the fields.

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that creates a new record of the given type.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: Type of a Salesforce object. Example: "Account".

Parameter.Name: fields

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that creates or updates record of the given type, based on the given external ID.
Token.Declaration: - (SFRestRequest *)requestForUpsertWithObjectType:(NSString *)objectType externalIdField:(NSString *)externalIdField externalId:(nullable NSString *)externalId fields:(NSDictionary<NSString*,id> *)fields apiVersion:(nullable NSString *)apiVersion

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: Type of a Salesforce object. Example: "Account".

Parameter.Name: fields

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that updates field values on a record of the given type.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: Type of a Salesforce object. Example: "Account".

Parameter.Name: fields
Parameter.Abstract: NSDictionary object containing initial field names and values for the record. Example: {Name: "salesforce.com", TickerSymbol "CRM"}.

Token.Abstract: Same as requestForUpdateWithObjectType:objectId:fields but only executing update if the server record was not modified since ifModifiedSinceDate.
Token.Declaration: - (SFRestRequest *)requestForUpdateWithObjectType:(NSString *)objectType objectId:(NSString *)objectId fields:(nullable NSDictionary<NSString*,id> *)fields ifUnmodifiedSinceDate:(nullable NSDate *)ifUnmodifiedSinceDate apiVersion:(nullable NSString *)apiVersion

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: Type of a Salesforce object. Example: "Account".

Parameter.Name: fields
Parameter.Abstract: NSDictionary object containing initial field names and values for the specified record.

Parameter.Name: ifUnmodifiedSinceDate
Parameter.Abstract: Update occurs only if the current last modified date of the specified record is older than ifUnmodifiedSinceDate. Otherwise, this method returns a 412 (precondition failed) error.

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that deletes a record of the given type.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: Type of a Salesforce object. Example: "Account".

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that executes the specified SOQL query.

Parameter.Name: soql
Parameter.Abstract: String containing the query to execute. Example: "SELECT Id, Name from Account ORDER BY Name LIMIT 20".

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that executes the specified SOQL query.

Parameter.Name: soql
Parameter.Abstract: String containing the query to execute. Example: "SELECT Id, Name from Account ORDER BY Name LIMIT 20".

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that executes the specified SOQL query. The result includes deleted objects.

Parameter.Name: soql
Parameter.Abstract: String containing the query to execute. Example: "SELECT Id, Name from Account ORDER BY Name LIMIT 20".

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that executes the specified SOSL search.

Parameter.Name: sosl
Parameter.Abstract: String containing the search to execute. Example: "FIND {needle}".

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that returns an ordered list of objects in the default global search scope of a logged-in user.
Returns an SFRestRequest object that contains search result layout information for the objects in the query string.

Parameter.Name: objectList
Parameter.Abstract: Comma-separated list of objects for which to return values. Example: "Account,Contact".

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that executes a batch of requests.

Parameter.Name: haltOnError
Parameter.Abstract: Controls whether Salesforce stops processing subrequests if a subrequest fails.

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that executes a composite request.

Parameter.Name: refIds
Parameter.Abstract: Array of reference IDs for the requests. The number of elements should match the number of requests.

Parameter.Name: allOrNone
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies whether to return partial results when an error occurs while processing a subrequest.

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object that executes an sObject tree request.

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: Type of a Salesforce object. Example: "Account".

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object for getting list of record related to offline briefcase

Parameter.Name: relayToken
Parameter.Abstract: Relay token (to get next page of results)

Parameter.Name: timestamp
Parameter.Abstract: To only get ids of records that changed after given time - or nil

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object for creating multiple records with fewer round trips

Parameter.Name: allOrNone
Parameter.Abstract: Indicates whether to roll back the entire request when the creation of any object fails (true) or to continue with the independent creation of other objects in the request.

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object for retrieving multiple records with fewer round trips

Parameter.Name: objectIds
Parameter.Abstract: Array of Salesforce IDs of the requested records.

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object for updating multiple records with fewer round trips

Parameter.Name: allOrNone
Parameter.Abstract: Indicates whether to roll back the entire request when the update of any object fails (true) or to continue with the independent update of other objects in the request.

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object for upserting multiple records with fewer round trips

Parameter.Name: allOrNone
Parameter.Abstract: Indicates whether to roll back the entire request when the upsert of any object fails (true) or to continue with the independent upsert of other objects in the request.

Parameter.Name: externalIdField
Parameter.Abstract: Name of ID field in source data.

Token.Abstract: Returns an SFRestRequest object for deleting multiple records with fewer round trips

Parameter.Name: allOrNone
Parameter.Abstract: Indicates whether to roll back the entire request when the delete of any object fails (true) or to continue with the independent delete of other objects in the request.

Parameter.Name: objectIds
Parameter.Abstract: List of Salesforce IDs of the records to delete.

Token.Abstract: Provides the User-Agent string used by Mobile SDK.
* Returns the User-Agent string used by Mobile SDK, adding the qualifier after the app type.

Parameter.Name: qualifier
Parameter.Abstract: Optional subtype of native or hybrid Mobile SDK app.

Token.Abstract: Returns a request to fetch the status of notifications, including unread and unseen count.
Returns a request to fetch the given notification.
Active requests property.
Active requests property.
Active requests property.
Force a request to timeout: for testing only!

Parameter.Name: req
Parameter.Abstract: The request to force a timeout on, or nil to grab any active request and force it to timeout

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if we were able to find and timeout the request, NO if the request could not be found

Token.Abstract: The search term to be sanitized.

Parameter.Name: searchTerm
Parameter.Abstract: The search term to be sanitized.

Token.Abstract: Generate a SOSL search.

Parameter.Name: term
Parameter.Abstract: - the search term. This is sanitized for proper characters

Parameter.Name: objectScope
Parameter.Abstract: - nil to search all searchable objects, or a dictionary where each key is an sObject name and each value is a string with the fieldlist and (optional) where, order by, and limit clause for that object. or NSNull to not specify any fields/clauses for that object

ReturnValue.Abstract: query or nil if a query could not be generated

Token.Abstract: Generate a SOSL search.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable NSString *)SOSLSearchWithSearchTerm:(NSString *)term fieldScope:(nullable NSString *)fieldScope objectScope:(nullable NSDictionary<NSString*,NSString*> *)objectScope limit:(NSInteger)limit

Parameter.Name: term
Parameter.Abstract: - the search term. This is sanitized for proper characters

Parameter.Name: fieldScope
Parameter.Abstract: - nil OR the SOSL scope, e.g. "IN ALL FIELDS". if nil, defaults to "IN NAME FIELDS"

Parameter.Name: objectScope
Parameter.Abstract: - nil to search all searchable objects, or a dictionary where each key is an sObject name and each value is a string with the fieldlist and (optional) where, order by, and limit clause for that object. or NSNull to not specify any fields/clauses for that object

ReturnValue.Abstract: query or nil if a query could not be generated

Token.Abstract: Generate a SOQL query.

Parameter.Name: limit
Parameter.Abstract: - limit count, or 0 for no limit (for use with query locators)

ReturnValue.Abstract: query or nil if a query could not be generated

Token.Abstract: Generate a SOQL query.
Token.Declaration: + (nullable NSString *)SOQLQueryWithFields:(NSArray<NSString*> *)fields sObject:(NSString *)sObject whereClause:(nullable NSString *)whereClause groupBy:(nullable NSArray<NSString*> *)groupBy having:(nullable NSString *)having orderBy:(nullable NSArray<NSString*> *)orderBy limit:(NSInteger)limit

Parameter.Name: groupBy
Parameter.Abstract: - nil OR NSArray of strings, each string is an individual group by clause

Parameter.Name: orderBy
Parameter.Abstract: - nil OR NSArray of strings, each string is an individual order by clause

Parameter.Name: limit
Parameter.Abstract: - limit count, or 0 for no limit (for use with query locators)

ReturnValue.Abstract: query or nil if a query could not be generated

Token.Abstract: Build a Request that can fetch a page from the files owned by the specified user.

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: if nil the context user is used, otherwise it should be an Id of a user.

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the first page, otherwise fetches the specified page.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data.

Token.Abstract: Build a Request that can fetch a page from the list of files from groups that the user is a member of.

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: if nil the context user is used, otherwise it should be an Id of a user.

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the first page, otherwise fetches the specified page.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data.

Token.Abstract: Build a Request that can fetch a page from the list of files that have been shared with the user.

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: if nil the context user is used, otherwise it should be an Id of a user.

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the first page, otherwise fetches the specified page.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data.

Token.Abstract: Build a Request that can fetch the file details of a particular version of a file.

Parameter.Name: version
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the most recent version, otherwise fetches this specific version.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data.

Token.Abstract: Build a request that can fetch the latest file details of one or more files in a single request.

Parameter.Name: sfdcIds
Parameter.Abstract: The list of file Ids to fetch.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

Token.Abstract: Build a Request that can fetch the a preview/rendition of a particular page of the file (and version).
Token.Declaration: - (SFRestRequest *)requestForFileRendition:(NSString *)sfdcId version:(nullable NSString *)version renditionType:(NSString *)renditionType page:(NSUInteger)page apiVersion:(nullable NSString *)apiVersion

Parameter.Name: version
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the most recent version, otherwise fetches this specific version

Parameter.Name: renditionType
Parameter.Abstract: What format of rendition do you want to get

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: which page to fetch, pages start at 0.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data.

Token.Abstract: Builds a request that can fetch the actual binary file contents of this particular file.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data.

Token.Abstract: Build a request that can fetch a page from the list of entities that this file is shared to.

Parameter.Name: page
Parameter.Abstract: if nil fetches the first page, otherwise fetches the specified page.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to fetch this data.

Token.Abstract: Build a request that will add a file share for the specified fileId to the specified entityId.

Parameter.Name: fileId
Parameter.Abstract: the Id of the file being shared.

Parameter.Name: entityId
Parameter.Abstract: the Id of the entity to share the file to (e.g. a user or a group).

Parameter.Name: shareType
Parameter.Abstract: the type of share (V - View, C - Collaboration).

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that be can used to create this share.

Token.Abstract: Build a request that will delete the specified file share.

Parameter.Name: shareId
Parameter.Abstract: The Id of the file share record (aka ContentDocumentLink).

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new SFRestRequest that can be used to delete this share.

Token.Abstract: Build a request that can upload a new file to the server, this will create a new file at version 1.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: Data to upload to the server.

Parameter.Name: mimeType
Parameter.Abstract: The mime-type of the file, if known.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A SFRestRequest that can perform this upload.

Token.Abstract: Build a request that can upload a new profile photo to the server

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: Data to upload to the server.

Parameter.Name: mimeType
Parameter.Abstract: The mime-type of the file, if known.

Parameter.Name: userId
Parameter.Abstract: The id of the user to update.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A SFRestRequest that can perform this upload.

Token.Abstract: Creates an error object with the given description.
Sends a request you've already built, using blocks to return status.

Parameter.Name: failureBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error).

Parameter.Name: successBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request successfully completes.

Token.Abstract: Sends a request you've already built, using blocks to return status.

Parameter.Name: failureBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error).

Parameter.Name: successBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request successfully completes.

Token.Abstract: Sends a request you've already built, using blocks to return status.

Parameter.Name: failureBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request fails (timeout, cancel, or error).

Parameter.Name: successBlock
Parameter.Abstract: Block to be executed when the request successfully completes.
